snippet.title: Sonic Dream Team - Animated Intro
snippet.description:
There's no pinching yourself awake here! Dr. Eggman has trapped Sonic and friends in a bizarre dream, and it's going to take the entire crew to stop this dream from becoming a living nightmare.

Grab Sonic Dream Team today, exclusively on Apple Arcade: https://apple.co/sonic-dream-team

Check out our other social pages to stay up-to-date on the latest Sonic happenings:

https://twitter.com/sonic_hedgehog
https://facebook.com/sonic
https://instagram.com/sonicthehedgehog
https://tiktok.com/@sonic_hedgehog
